remark.ch: 限中研院國際研究生院MST學程學生修習。一/9:10-10:00、三/10:10-12:00, 台大化學館121R
remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. Class time: Mon 9:10-10:00、Wed 10:10-12:00.  Classroom: R121.Chemistry Building,NTU

goal.ch: Provide students scientific knowledge to do the research work
goal.en: Provide students scientific knowledge to do the research work

outline.ch:
“In this section, we will cover some topics related to electronic, vibronic, photoionization, and photoelectron spectroscopies as well as lasers.
1. The characteristics of electronic transitions
2. The fates of electronically excited states
3. Lasers
4. Electronic spectroscopy
5. Vibronic spectroscopy
6. Photoionization spectroscopy
7. Photoelectron spectroscopy“
outline.en:
“In this section, we will cover some topics related to electronic, vibronic, photoionization, and photoelectron spectroscopies as well as lasers.
1. The characteristics of electronic transitions
2. The fates of electronically excited states
3. Lasers
4. Electronic spectroscopy
5. Vibronic spectroscopy
6. Photoionization spectroscopy
7. Photoelectron spectroscopy“

en.competencies: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield

ch: 系所:限物理學系碩士班、物理學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc  in Physics、PhD in Physics only.
